website.name: B.E.T. Plumbing LLC
website.description: Professional plumbing company owned by Brandon Tolkacevic, serving Pittsburgh and Allegheny County with comprehensive plumbing services including emergency repairs, water heater installation, drain cleaning, and complete bathroom remodels. Available 24/7 on weekends with same-day service.

theme.name: Professional Plumbing Services
theme.aesthetic: Professional and trustworthy with clean, modern design showcasing expertise and reliability
theme.mood: Confident, dependable, and approachable - conveying professional competence while remaining accessible to homeowners
theme.targetAudience: Homeowners and property managers in Pittsburgh and Allegheny County seeking reliable plumbing services
theme.designPrinciples: Clean layouts with strong visual hierarchy, prominent contact information, before/after work showcases, and trust signals like reviews and certifications
theme.gradientStyle: Navy blue hexagonal logo-inspired design with subtle gradients from navy to deeper navy tones, clean white backgrounds and professional navy accents matching the BET logo

pages.name: Home
pages.layout: Hero section with company name, tagline, and emergency contact prominently displayed over professional plumbing background image. Below hero: services overview grid with 6 key services (3 columns on desktop, 2 on tablet, 1 on mobile). Next section: company credentials with years of experience, service areas, and review score with star rating. Testimonials section with customer reviews in card format. Contact section with phone, address, service hours, and service area map. Footer with contact info, service links, and business information.

sections.name: Hero
sections.content: Professional plumbing services you can trust. Brandon Tolkacevic and the B.E.T. Plumbing team serve Pittsburgh and Allegheny County with fast, reliable repairs and installations. Available 24/7 on weekends - we respond within hours, not days.

sections.name: Services Grid
sections.content: Complete plumbing solutions for your home and business. From emergency repairs to scheduled installations, we handle it all with professional expertise and fair pricing.

sections.name: About & Credentials
sections.content: B.E.T. Plumbing LLC, owned by Brandon Tolkacevic, has been serving Pittsburgh and surrounding areas with professional plumbing services. We specialize in water heater installation, drain cleaning, pipe repair, complete bathroom remodels, and emergency services. Operating Monday-Friday 7AM-5PM with 24-hour weekend availability, our commitment to quality work and customer satisfaction has earned us 5.0 stars on Google with over 76 reviews.

sections.name: Customer Reviews
sections.content: Real testimonials from satisfied customers: 'I couldn't be happier with the service I received from BET Plumbing' - Dandelion Nails. 'BET is literally the fastest plumber service that I've ever encountered' - M D. 'Prices are fair and quality of work is guaranteed satisfaction' - LeQuira Hutson. 'Brandon is a true professional and knows what he is doing when it comes to plumbing. Quick, reliable young man' - Home Advisor (5.0 rating).

sections.name: Contact & Service Areas
sections.content: Ready to solve your plumbing problems? Contact Brandon at B.E.T. Plumbing LLC today for fast, professional service. Located at 121 Ingram Ave, Pittsburgh, we serve all of Allegheny County. Monday-Friday 7AM-5PM, with 24-hour weekend emergency services available.

pages.name: Services
pages.layout: Page header with services overview and value proposition. Main content area with detailed service sections, each featuring service description, typical projects, and pricing approach. Service categories include water heater services, drain cleaning, pipe repair, leak detection, excavation work, and emergency services. Each section includes relevant project images and clear calls to action.

sections.name: Water Heater Services
sections.content: Complete water heater installation, repair, and replacement services. We work with all major brands and can handle both traditional tank and tankless systems. Professional installation ensures optimal performance and extends equipment life.

sections.name: Drain Cleaning & Repair
sections.content: Professional drain cleaning services using advanced equipment to clear even the toughest clogs. From kitchen sinks to main sewer lines, we restore proper drainage quickly and effectively.

sections.name: Pipe Installation & Repair
sections.content: Expert pipe installation and repair services for residential and commercial properties. We handle everything from small leak repairs to complete repiping projects using quality materials and proven techniques.

sections.name: Excavation & Underground Work
sections.content: Professional excavation services for sewer line repair, water line installation, and underground plumbing work. We use proper equipment and techniques to minimize property damage while completing necessary underground repairs.

pages.name: About
pages.layout: Company introduction with business history and values. Team section highlighting expertise and commitment to quality. Service area information with coverage map. Credentials and certifications section. Company mission and customer commitment statements with supporting testimonials.

sections.name: Our Story
sections.content: B.E.T. Plumbing LLC was founded with a simple mission: provide reliable, professional plumbing services at fair prices. Based in Ingram, Pennsylvania, we've built our reputation on quality work, honest pricing, and exceptional customer service throughout Pittsburgh and Allegheny County.

sections.name: Service Excellence
sections.content: Our commitment to excellence shows in every job we complete. From emergency repairs to planned installations, we approach each project with professionalism and attention to detail. Our 5.0 Google rating reflects our dedication to customer satisfaction and quality workmanship.

sections.name: Service Area
sections.content: Proudly serving Pittsburgh, Ingram, and all of Allegheny County. Our central location allows us to provide fast response times throughout the region. Whether you're dealing with a plumbing emergency or planning a renovation, we're here to help.

pages.name: Portfolio
pages.layout: Project showcase gallery with before/after images organized by service category. Each project features description of work performed, challenges overcome, and results achieved. Filter options allow visitors to view projects by service type (water heaters, drain cleaning, pipe work, excavation). Testimonials integrated throughout to provide context and customer feedback.

sections.name: Water Heater Installations
sections.content: Professional water heater installations showcasing our expertise with various systems and configurations. Each installation meets code requirements and manufacturer specifications for optimal performance and longevity.

sections.name: Drain Cleaning Projects
sections.content: Examples of our drain cleaning work, from simple clogs to complex main line issues. We use professional equipment and techniques to restore proper drainage and prevent future problems.

sections.name: Pipe Installation & Repair
sections.content: Comprehensive pipe work including new installations, repairs, and system upgrades. Our work ensures reliable water supply and proper drainage for residential and commercial properties.

sections.name: Excavation & Underground Work
sections.content: Professional excavation projects for sewer line repair, water line installation, and underground utility work. We complete these projects efficiently while minimizing disruption to your property.

pages.name: Contact
pages.layout: Contact header with multiple contact methods prominently displayed. Main section split between contact form on left and business information on right including address, phone, hours, and service areas. Emergency contact information highlighted throughout. Map section showing service coverage area across Pittsburgh and Allegheny County.

sections.name: Get In Touch
sections.content: Ready for professional plumbing service? Contact B.E.T. Plumbing LLC today. Call us directly for immediate assistance or use our contact form to describe your plumbing needs. We provide free estimates for most services.

sections.name: Business Information
sections.content: B.E.T. Plumbing LLC is located at 121 Ingram Ave, Pittsburgh, PA 15205. We serve all of Allegheny County and surrounding areas. Our team is available for emergency services and scheduled appointments.

sections.name: Service Hours & Coverage
sections.content: We provide plumbing services throughout Pittsburgh and Allegheny County. Emergency services available for urgent plumbing problems. Regular business hours with extended availability for scheduled work and emergency calls.

layouts.layoutStyle: Clean, professional layout with strong visual hierarchy and prominent contact information throughout. Navy blue and white color scheme matching the hexagonal BET logo conveys trust and professionalism. Generous use of white space with clear section divisions.
layouts.navigationStyle: Fixed header navigation with company logo, main menu items (Home, Services, About, Portfolio, Contact), and prominent phone number. Mobile hamburger menu with slide-out navigation. Sticky contact button on mobile for easy access.
layouts.extra: Navy blue hexagonal BET logo prominently displayed in header. Emergency contact information prominently displayed in header and footer. Review ratings and testimonials integrated throughout site. Before/after image galleries showcasing work quality. Service area coverage clearly communicated. Brandon Tolkacevic's name and expertise highlighted throughout. 24/7 weekend availability emphasized for competitive advantage.

templateInfo.description: Professional plumbing services website for B.E.T. Plumbing LLC, showcasing comprehensive plumbing services with emphasis on trustworthiness, professional expertise, and customer satisfaction.

businessInfo.name: B.E.T. Plumbing LLC
businessInfo.serviceArea: Pittsburgh, Ingram, Crafton, and all of Allegheny County
businessInfo.responseTime: Same-day service, within 1 hour for emergencies
specialties: Drain cleaning and sewer line repairs
keyDifferentiators: Fastest response time in Pittsburgh area

BET is literally the fastest plumber service that I've ever encountered.
Prices are fair and quality of work is guaranteed satisfaction.
Excellent work, excellent response time and continued communication. I would highly recommend them for any plumbing job.
Brandon is a true professional and knows what he is doing when it comes to plumbing. Quick, reliable young man. I highly recommend BET for all of your plumbing...
